version_description: Bug fixes
Bug fixes
Bug fixes

These new versions of FreeFlight v3.9 and Parrot Bebop drone firmware v3.2 unveil new major features in FreeFlight3 app and Flight plan (in-app purchase). With this release, our users will enjoy new smart video and piloting modes as well as a secure wifi connexion between their smartphone and their drone.
This release is for Parrot Bebop drones (1 & 2) owners. Both, the app and the firmware, need to be updated.

Flight Plan Feature #1: POINT OF INTEREST (POI)
This new feature allows you to set a specific location such as a building or an object as a Point of Interest in Flight Plan app. Your Parrot Bebop drone will adapt its orientation during the waypoints to keep the POI in the field of view while you record the perfect shots.

Flight Plan Feature #2: PROGRESSIVE COURSE
This feature allows you to set a progressive course between two waypoints in Flight Plan app. Your Parrot Bebop drone will progressively modify its orientation for better smooth videos.

FreeFlight3 Feature #1: SECURE LINK
With Secure Link you can set a secure wifi connexion between the drone and the smartphone with an 8-characters password (WPA2). This option can be activated in FreeFlight3 Network settings.

FreeFlight3 Feature #2: BANKED TURN MODE
Banked turn mode is an assisted piloting option allowing you to easily make turns in which the drone inclines for a sporty flight behavior. Your aerial shots will be more dynamic than before. You can activate this option in FreeFlight 3 Flight settings.
bug fix

EVP (Enhanced Video Processing) is a new firmware update for Parrot Bebop Drones range. The actual video processing has been optimized from the ground up to bring precise improvements to exposure measurements, noise reduction and image compression.
This update also unveils new video settings to easily edit videos and enhance the quality of your shots.
Download FreeFlight Pro, the free app that allows you to access advanced flight settings and pilot your Parrot Bebop, Bebop 2 and Disco drones.

- FreeFlight 3 now becomes FreeFlight Pro. Use to pilot Parrot Bebop drone, Bebop 2 and Disco.
For Flight Plan enthusiasts, you can find your plans in the new app FreeFlight Pro.

- FreeFlight Mini is now available to pilot the Parrot Minidrones Airborne Cargo, Airborne Night, Hydrofoil, Rolling Spider, Mambo and Swing.
With FreeFlight Jumping, you can pilot the Jumping Sumo, Jumping Race and Jumping Night.

•Radio Controller calibration for Parrot Disco
•Bug fixes

For more details, visit community.parrot.com

- New Parrot Disco features (available from version 1.4.0)
o Add the possibility to force a Return Home after a disconnection during a Flight Plan.
o All waypoints must be inside the geofencing to start a Flight Plan.
- Bugs fixes.
Improves the stability of the application.
You can now try Flight Plan 15 days for free !

You can now restore In-App purchases.
The piloting bug in Ace mode is fixed.

FreeFlight Pro 5 improves the piloting interface to control your drone and add Sport and Video Mode for your Bebop.
Upgrade your Bebop 2 to throw it in the air and shoot better video with new features as Touch&Fly, Point Of Interest, Magic Dronies, Auto Shots, and Cameraman !
Fixes quick target losses on Cameraman mode

This version improves the application stability, fixes the waypoints offset in Flight Plan when the map is fully zoomed, and fixes a Bluetooth gamepad discovery problem.
You can now take JPEG Snapshots in Photo mode, and the default Return To Home delay duration after disconnection is set to 3s.

Thanks for choosing Parrot! We regularly update our application to offer you more features adapted to your needs.
With the latest version, we wanted to make the media viewing easier using a new gallery. Discover Flight Director, a video editing assistant that allows you to automatically create edits of your best moments, by personalizing the duration, music and overlays (in-app purchase).
Social media enthusiasts, we wanted to offer you the best. This is why you can now share your best shots instantly on Instagram, Facebook, Twitter and Snapchat. And because you love being the first to know, we promise to keep you updated about our promotions and events through the Parrot newsfeed.
Additional feature: use the photo timer to easily take pictures with your friends. Just hold down the camera icon and say cheese!
Last but not least, the app is now compatible with the Chinese cartographic system Baidu.

FreeFlight Pro now support the Parrot Bluegrass, the first Parrot quadcopter specifically designed for agriculture.
This version is compatible with the new Bebop 2 feature Bip My Drone (version 4.4.0 or above), optimized for the iPhone X, and also improves the application stability.

We also fixed Baidu map issues in China.
